Requirements¶

Cookbooks¶

  • deployer
  • ruby-ng
  • nginx

Platform¶

This cookbook was tested on the following OpsWorks platforms:

  • Amazon Linux 2017.03
  • Ubuntu 16.04 LTS

In addition, all recent Debian family distrubutions are assumed to work.
